text: (Lo! those who give alms, both men and women) because of their faith, (and lend unto Allah) through giving alms (a goodly loan) sincerely from their heart in seeking only Allah's pleasure, (it will be doubled for them) it will be accepted from them and increased from seven folds to 70 and up to 700 folds and two million folds, and even more as Allah wills, (and theirs will be a rich reward) a goodly reward in Paradise.
